races.name: Gods

distinguishing_features: May possess unique physical attributes like glowing eyes or radiant auras

culture.government: Theocratic (individual gods rule specific domains or pantheons exist)

special_abilities: Reality manipulation (limited by the Primordia Hierarchy Law)
Domain-specific powers (e.g., war god - exceptional combat prowess, nature god - control over elements)
Granting blessings and curses to mortals

races.name: Celestial Dragons

distinguishing_features: Scales that shimmer with celestial energy

culture.government: Varies - some are solitary, others form hierarchical packs

special_abilities: Immense physical strength and magical resistance
Elemental manipulation based on their specific type

relations.rivals: Other powerful creatures, greedy mortals who hunt them

races.name: Primordials

distinguishing_features: Embodiment of fundamental forces (fire, water, earth, etc.)
Bound by ancient constraints of the Primordia Hierarchy Law

races.habitat: Beyond the mortal realm, primal dimensions
special_abilities: Shaping the fabric of reality on a grand scale
Limited influence over lesser beings through Celestial Energy
